title: Rep. Thomas Massie Tweets Questionable Claim About Face Masks And Covid-19
description: Massie claimed on Twitter that “the data shows masks don’t work,” when in fact data and studies have shown the opposite: that face masks can significantly reduce the transmission of the severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

title: TP-Link Deco PX50 Is The Perfect Mesh Network For Larger Homes And Thick Walls
description: The TP-Link Deco PX50 is probably one ion the best networking mesh systems on the market right now. It offers Wi-Fi 6 speeds and can handle up to 150 devices. It can use a home electrical wiring system to transmit data, making it ideal for homes with thick walls that might block wireless signals.
